name: The Tomb of Lost Souls
description:
A long time ago, three necromancers were looking for the eternal life. They succeeded with the "Cage of Souls", a powerful artefact used to split a soul from its meat. They stole many lives until an alliance was formed in order to stop these devilish sorcerers. Unable to kill them , their enemies decided to seal the sanctuary. Left without victims, the necromancers resolved to become undeads and wait for a new era... The tomb of Lost Souls was forgotten... until now.

What the hell are you doing here?

A Mörk Borg dungeon filled with undeads and terrible treasures...

Map by Dysonlogos, monsters from my mind, the rulebook and Grave Matters (by Rinaldo Agostini).
